definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end

sentences.english: I lifted my right hand and made scissoring movements with my first two fingers.
sentences.chinese: 我抬起右手，用食指和中指做了几个剪东西的动作。

sentences.english: Poked the middle finger of his other hand through the circle. Poked it in and out. In and out.
sentences.chinese: 接着，他用另一只手的中指往那个圆圈里戳来戳去。

sentences.english: And in West Africa, the gesture is even more insulting than the upraised middle finger.
sentences.chinese: 而在西非，这姿态甚至比举起中指更具侮辱性。

sentences.english: You can move side to side, back and forth, or in circles with your middle finger.
sentences.chinese: 你可以两边着力，来来回回，或者用中指画圈。

sentences.english: A subfile in the CIFS protocol.
sentences.chinese: 在CIFS协议中指一个子文件。

sentences.english: Like a middle finger in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 就像是欧洲的竖中指手势一样。

sentences.english: ' She slipped the gold ring from her third finger, and threw it on the floor. 'I'll smash it! '
sentences.chinese: 她从中指上脱下那只金戒指，丢在地板上。

sentences.english: They don't known that using a middle finger is extremely rude in the English -speaking culture.
sentences.chinese: 他们不知道在英语文化中使用中指是极端无礼的行为。

sentences.english: Besides, the thread rope is respectively curled around the pollex and the middle finger and can prevent the cover body from falling off.
sentences.chinese: 且该线绳分别卷绕于姆指及中指上，可防止套体脱落。

sentences.english: No more beef fingers, no more drama from now on, I promise.
sentences.chinese: 不再竖中指，不再闹笑话，我保证。

sentences.english: Zhu then lifted his right hand and made scissoring movements with his first two fingers.
sentences.chinese: 朱军这时举起右手，用食指和中指做出剪东西的动作。

sentences.english: In some special cases, the flaps included the dorsal skin tissues of middle finger.
sentences.chinese: 可携蒂部分中指背皮肤，形成的皮瓣远端为双叶。

sentences.english: Use the middle finger to lightly press just below the middle collar bone.
sentences.chinese: 用中指轻轻地按压锁骨中间下部。

sentences.english: When she turned her back, Enzo flipped her off.
sentences.chinese: 在她转过身时，恩佐对她竖起了中指。

sentences.english: Press your index finer and your middle finger into the back of your tongue and into your throat.
sentences.chinese: 把你的食指和中指放进舌头的底部一直到喉咙之处。

sentences.english: The extensor tendon and unfold tendinous membrane of middle finger were exposed.
sentences.chinese: 解剖后暴露中指伸肌键和展腱膜。

definition: Tom Thumb (small person in folk tales)
to draw together/to place side by side (e.g. one's fingers, two halves of a torn sheet of paper etc)
the five fingers of one's hand
